name: simple-markdown-builder
description: A simple markdown-to-HTML site builder with optional translations

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m ":bookmark: %s" && git push --follow-tags && bun publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m ":bookmark: %s" && git push --follow-tags && bun publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m ":bookmark: %s" && git push --follow-tags && bun publish
